short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clear the cache of the active tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cache Clearer is a simple and efficient Google Chrome extension that lets you clear the cache of the active tab with a single click. This extension helps you ensure that your web page is loading the latest content by removing outdated cache files, without affecting cookies, SQL databases, or other browsing data. Itâ€™s perfect for developers, web testers, or anyone who wants to quickly refresh a page without manually clearing all browsing data. The extension supports both regular and incognito browsing modes, ensuring that your experience is smooth and hassle-free. After clearing the cache, the current tab reloads automatically to display the freshest version of the page. With a straightforward and focused design, "Cache Clearer" does exactly what it promises, keeping your browsing sessions fast and up to date.
